content: Hi everyone, welcome to the procedureRequest track stream. Here you can post questions and discuss the track.
@Danielle Friend Are there example ProcedureRequest resource instances available that conform to the various scenarios - transfer of care (referrals), invasive care, and non-invasive care?
@Richard Ettema I'm working on adding some of those examples now, I'll update the wiki and post on here once they are there.

@Danielle Friend Thank you. I'm interested in getting some TestScripts written and deployed to Touchstone, http://touchstone.com, to cover your track scenarios and valid test data is always a prerequisite.
